::Striker/Ramulus/Kluster::

"No," Striker replies on his comm-link, "All the survivors are in more or 
less good shape. The rest died in the crash or the battle."

He stands up, looking at Kluster. "I'll go get the Maximals to get ready to 
move," he says, walking out of the ship. He looks at Lunarpine and transforms 
into his beast mode.

"Let's get back to the Ark and get all the Maximals together," Striker says, 
running off toward the Ark.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus nods. His scanners were reporting that Primal was a Maximal. Ramulus 
looks from Primal to the Ark.

"Our base is kinda damaged. We're moving to a new one," he says, "I'm here to 
get everyone ready to move."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
As the missiles fired by the Predacon base head toward the Cybertronian Fire, 
the Maximal battle cruiser's scanners pick them up, alerting the autoguns and 
laser batteries into position.

The missiles aproach the ship.

The laser batteries open fire on the advancing missiles, destroying two 
before the third hits the shields, being destroyed by them.

Inside the ship, Kluster jumps to his feet. "So, the Preds decide to play 
rough, eh?"

He grins. "Computer, fire six missiles at the source of recent attack."

"Acnowledged." Three of the four missile launchers on the Cybertronian Fire 
swirl to position, each one firing two missiles, the missiles heading for the 
Predacon base.
